ai-mil7.2.2:1.1_0: “Venerable Sister, what are the five factors can be taken by one of them?”
ai-mil7.2.2:1.2_0: “Great king, in a chick from time to time is dropped in vain,
ai-mil7.2.2:1.3_0: In the same way, anyone who sets out from time to time has set out water for drinking and a shrine, and who settles out water for drinking and water for washing, should prepare the more than the senior monks.
ai-mil7.2.2:1.4_0: This is the first breaking out of the chicken.
ai-mil7.2.2:2.1_0: Furthermore, the chicken is just time.
ai-mil7.2.2:2.2_0: In the same way, anyone who is tending the army at the right time and setting out water for drinking and a shrine, and when the body is sprinkled and dirt, he should take care of the Shrine and drinking water for washing.
ai-mil7.2.2:2.3_0: This is the second Chicken took hold of a coil.
ai-mil7.2.2:3.1_0: Furthermore, great king, one chicken doesn’t dig the earth and stay there.
ai-mil7.2.2:3.2_0: In the same way, one who frequents embracing a practice that is good, one who, having checked it down, raises it, and make it stops all I shall put an end to old discomfort and not give rise to new discomfort, and I will live blamelessly and at ease.’
ai-mil7.2.2:3.4_0: The Buddha has spoken about the gods of the Thirty-Three:
ai-mil7.2.2:4.2_0: like the ointment off the eye.
ai-mil7.2.2:4.3_0: Thus I eat food brought by food
ai-mil7.2.2:5.1_0: Furthermore, a chicken is blind and sightless.
ai-mil7.2.2:5.2_0: In the same way, great king, when you wander for alms in the forest with the shade of the blind men, you should be caught in the village with your ropes and trapped in the forest by the horns, and you should not be caught in the forest by the sight of your enemy.
ai-mil7.2.2:6.2_0: though you have ears, be as if deaf;
ai-mil7.2.2:6.3_0: though you have wisdom, be as if stupid;
ai-mil7.2.2:6.4_0: though you have strength, be as if feeble.
ai-mil7.2.2:6.5_0: and has arisen in the world,
ai-mil7.2.2:6.6_0: lie as still as a corpse.’
ai-mil7.2.2:7.1_0: Furthermore, a chicken doesn’t break out of the air at the foot of a tree.
ai-mil7.2.2:7.2_0: In the same way, when someone is doing a building work, anyone who does too close to the opposite sex, that is, proper attention should practice properly when they doing this.
ai-mil7.2.2:7.4_0: The Blessed One, great king, has spoken these gods: ‘The lord of the gods, the domain of his own territory, the lord of death.’
ai-mil7.2.2:7.5_0: It’s the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.’
ai-mil7.2.2:7.6_0: The senior monk who has heard this statement should be followed by the Teacher, the teaching, and the Saṅgha.
ai-mil7.2.2:8.1_0: ‘Just as the Ganges knows the jot of Māra.
ai-mil7.2.2:8.4_0: they’re stated of their own advantages.
ai-mil7.2.2:9.1_0: So too, the Buddha was instructed
ai-mil7.2.2:9.3_0: One should not grab a roar.
ai-mil7.2.2:10.1_0: The second chickens in a chicken’s womb.
